oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Inhomogeneous magnetic state in RAgAl (R = rare earth)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SURESH, KG
DHAR, SK
NIGAM, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: spin-glass behavior
electronic-structure
dypdin
tbpdin
dy
nd
er
intermetallics
long-range order
spin glass
magnetic frustration
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Polycrystalline RAgAl (R = La, Ce, Pr, Nd, Tb and Er) compounds which crystallize in the orthorhombic CeCu2-type structure were prepared. Magnetization, AC susceptibility, heat capacity and electrical resistivity studies show characteristics of both long-range order as well as magnetic frustration. Randomness associated with the distribution of non-magnetic atoms may be responsible for the frustration. This system appears to belong to a very special class of materials in which long-range magnetic order or an extended short-range order co-exists with the spin glass-like states. (C) 2004
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MAGNETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS, 288(), 452-459
